flawed_nl_solution:
Angela has 8 more marbles than Allison who has 28 so Angela has 8+28 = <<8+28=31>>31 marbles
Albert has three times as many marbles as Angela who has 31 so Albert has 3*31 = <<3*31=93>>93 marbles
Albert and Allison together have 93+28 = <<93+28=121>>121 marbles
#### 121

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 31. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
